Package com.cafean.client.ui.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.message.Message
  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single item that has been added to the MessageWindow. Each message may be associated with an array of ComponentElements

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ALERT
      Message severity for non-error messages that the user should be alerted to.
      static int ERROR
      Message severity for errors that are considered user created or caused

      the icon to preface alert messages with in the messageTable

      the icon to preface info messages with in the messageTable

      • setOutputStream

        public static void setOutputStream​(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Sets the PrintStream that this MessageWindow sends it's alternate output stream to. The alternate output stream can be turned off by using setOutputStream(null) and defaults to System.err.
        Parameters:
        out - the PrintStream to print alternate output to.

      • getOutputStream

        public static java.io.PrintStream getOutputStream()
        Retrieves the PrintStream that this MessageWindow sends it's alternate output stream to. The alternate output stream can be turned off by using setOutputStream(null) and defaults to System.err.
        Returns:
        the PrintStream default output stream for exporting messages.

      • addMessage

        public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Adds a new message to the MessageWindow. This method will add the provided message to the message window. If the message starts with the word "Error" (case sensitive) the message will be set as an error message, and that word will be removed from the message text. Similarly if the message starts with the word "Warning", the message will be set as a warning message with the word "Warning" removed from the front. Otherwise the message will be flagged as an info message.
        Parameters:
        message - the String to be added to the MessageWindow.
        See Also:
        ApplicationFrame.addMessage(com.cafean.client.ui.message.Message), WARNING, ERROR, INFO

      • addMessage

        public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String text,
                              int severityCode)
        Adds the given text as a message to the message window with the given severity code chosen from those in Message.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to be added to the MessageWindow
        severityCode - the Message based enumeration for the type of message. Available types include:
        • INFO
        • WARNING
        • ERROR
        • ALERT
        • INTERNAL
        See Also:
        MainFrame.addMessage(java.lang.String)

      • addMessage

        public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String text,
                              AbstractComponent comp)
        Adds the given text to the message window as a notice associated with the given component. This will default to an INFO message.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to be added to the MessageWindow
        comp - the AbstractComponent.
        See Also:
        MainFrame.addMessage(java.lang.String)

                              int severityCode)
        Adds the given text as a message to the message window associated with the given component
        Parameters:

        comp - the AbstractComponent.

        • INFO
        • WARNING
        • ERROR
        • ALERT
        • INTERNAL

      • addMessage

        public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String text,
                              AbstractComponent comp,
                              int severityCode,
                              AutoCorrection correction)
        Adds the given text as a message to the message window associated with the given component
        Parameters:
        text - the String to be added to the MessageWindow
        comp - the AbstractComponent.
        severityCode - the Message based enumeration for the type of message. Available types include:
        • INFO
        • WARNING
        • ERROR
        • ALERT
        • INTERNAL
        correction - an AutoCorrection instance that will allow the user to resolve the error/warning.

                              ViewComponent view,
                              javax.swing.JComponent uiComp,
                              int severityCode)
        Adds the given text as a message to the Message Window associated with the given ViewComponent for the given GUI Component.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to be added to the MessageWindow
        view - the ViewComponent
        uiComp - the JComponent that the given message refers to
        severityCode - the Message based enumeration for the type of message. Available types include:
        • INFO
        • WARNING
        • ERROR
        • ALERT
        • INTERNAL

      • addMessage

        public static void addMessage​(java.lang.String summary,
                              java.lang.String body,
                              java.lang.Object[] elements,
                              int severityCode)
        Adds the given text as a multi-line message to the message window associated with the given components.
        Parameters:
        summary - the String to used as the summary label of the new message
        body - the optional body text for providing more details for errors.
        elements - [] an array of objects associated with this issue.
        severityCode - the Message based enumeration for the type of message. Available types include:
        • INFO
        • WARNING
        • ERROR
        • ALERT
        • INTERNAL
